about.bio: Hi, I’m Ari - a curious introvert with a love for video games, science fiction, and cats, as well as a deep passion for coding. I also have a background in philosophy. Since 2021, I’ve built a strong technical foundation through self-directed learning and recently completed a frontend development program with Coding Bootcamps Europe. I’m excited to embrace new challenges and keep expanding my skills and horizons.

projects.volo: VoloDB is an open-source project designed to significantly simplify the administration of the volunteer service formats FSJ (Freiwilliges Soziales Jahr) and BFD (Bundesfreiwilligendienst) recognized in Germany. I have been working on it as part of a small team since spring 2024. In November 2024, we held a two-day workshop to discuss and outline the next steps for our project. We also met with an organization that plans to use VoloDB in the future (scheduled for fall 2026) and discussed their specific needs.
projects.books: Using the 'Bookmonkey API', this Website list books, marks them as favorites and shows details of single books.
projects.shopping: Using just HTML and CSS i created a Shopping layout.

contact.description: I am happy to connect with you, lets talk web development, video games or our favourite memes!
